description:
AlmaLinux OS distribution now officially supports the Raspberry Pi 5 computer with the GNOME desktop environment by default.

The post AlmaLinux OS Now Officially Supports the Raspberry Pi 5 Computer appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: AlmaLinux OS Now Officially Supports the Raspberry Pi 5 Computer
